SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT530
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by an account owner to an account servicer (account servicing institution). The account owner will generally be a financial institution that has an account with a local Central Securities Depository (CSD) or with an International Central Securities Depository (ICSD).
It is used to request the modification of a processing indicator or other non-matching information.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86) :

Code.Name: NEWM
Code.Description: New message.

Validation.Comment: Subfunction, when present, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85) :

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: COMM, MITI, POOL, PREV, RELA, TRRF
Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
If Qualifier is BORR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: LAMI
Code.Description: Only last resort borrowing should be considered to make settlement occur.

Code.Name: NBOR
Code.Description: No automatic borrowing should take place.

Code.Name: RTRN
Code.Description: Return of stocks should take place.

Code.Name: YBOR
Code.Description: Automatic borrowing should take place to effect settlement in case of insufficient securities.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CONP and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: YCON
Code.Description: The failing instruction due to expire is confirmed for settlement. Do not cancel automatically.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is LINK and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: LINK
Code.Description: Request is to link the reference in B to the reference(s) in B1.

Code.Name: SOFT
Code.Description: Request is to soft link the reference in B to the reference(s) in B1.

Code.Name: UNLK
Code.Description: Request is to unlink the reference in B to the reference(s) in B1.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is MTCH and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22).

Code.Name: MTRE
Code.Description: Matching process is to be resumed for the referenced transaction.

Code.Name: UNMT
Code.Description: The referenced transaction is requested to be unmatched.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PRTL and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) .

Code.Name: NPAR
Code.Description: Partial settlement is not allowed.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Partial settlement is allowed.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is RTGS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the non-RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the RTGS instruction, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the non-RTGS system, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is SETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NPRE
Code.Description: The instruction is NOT to be presented for settlement.

Code.Name: YPRE
Code.Description: The instruction is to be presented for settlement.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is SPLT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain the following code (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: TRAD
Code.DetailedName: Request to unilaterally split the transaction.
Code.Description: The referenced transaction is requested to be unmatched.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is LINK and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: AFTE
Code.Description: Indicates that the message is to be processed after the linked message.

Code.Name: BEFO
Code.Description: Indicates that the message is to be processed before the linked message.

Code.Name: WITH
Code.Description: Indicates that the message is to be processed with the linked message.

Validation.Comment: Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: COMM, MITI, PCTI, POOL, PREV, RELA, TRRF
Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Qualifier.Name: SETT
Qualifier.Description: Quantity of Financial Instrument to be Settled

Validation.Comment: Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36) :

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Proprietary code (Format Option R)must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .
If Qualifier is IPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Instruction is cancelled.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Instruction is accepted.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Instruction is rejected.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CAND or Qualifier is PACK and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is REJT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: CASY
Code.Description: Disagreement on cash settlement system.

Code.Name: DDAT
Code.Description: Disagreement on settlement date.

Code.Name: DDEA
Code.Description: Disagreement on deal price.

Code.Name: DEPT
Code.Description: Disagreement on Place of Settlement.

Code.Name: DMON
Code.Description: Disagreement on settlement amount.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Disagreement on settlement quantity.

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Disagreement on financial instrument identification.

Code.Name: DTRD
Code.Description: Disagreement on trade date.

Code.Name: ICAG
Code.Description: Disagreement on receiving or delivering agent.

Code.Name: ICUS
Code.Description: Disagreement on receiving or delivering custodian.

Code.Name: IEXE
Code.Description: Disagreement on buyer or seller.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: NCRR
Code.Description: Disagreement on settlement amount currency.

Code.Name: PLCE
Code.Description: Disagreement on place of trade.

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.DetailedName: Impossible to use the RTGS system instructed
Code.Description: Disagreement on RTGS system instructed (NRTG or YRTG).

Code.Name: SETR
Code.Description: Disagreement on settlement transaction type (relates to the settlement transaction type codes available for sequence E field 22F, qualifier SETR).

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Disagreement on settlement system/method instructed.

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 In each occurrence of Sequence B, all orders of field 20C are optional, but at least one (any one) must be present (Error code(s): D92).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of Sequence B, all orders of field 20C are optional, but at least one (any one) must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 In each occurrence of Sequence B, all orders of field 22F are optional, but at least one (any one) must be present (Error code(s): D93).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of Sequence B, all orders of field 22F are optional, but at least one (any one) must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: Within each occurrence of subsequence C1a, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of its surrounding subsequence C1 (Error code(s): E37).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of subsequence C1a, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of its surrounding subsequence C1. If the Data Source Scheme is present in field :25D:: then the conditional rule does not apply (Error code(s): E37)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-22F-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-22F-A In option F, if Qualifier is PRIR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain a numerical value in the range 0001 - 9999 where 0001 refers to the highest priority (Error code(s): K22):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In option F, if Qualifier is PRIR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain a numerical value in the range 0001 - 9999 where 0001 refers to the highest priority."

fieldvalidation.name: FC-35B-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FC-35B-A ISIN is used at the beginning of Identification of Security (Subfield 1) and must be composed of uppercase letters only (Error code(s): T12).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: $value + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"

fieldvalidation.name: FC-35B-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c";
